text: ... and as always the voice of those in our care counts, the colleagues who work there & those of you who support us all as families and friends.  Our #WoodhillGrowthProject may have had its launch paused because of Covid but it doesn‚Äôt mean we have stopped growing. #HOPE #growth
user_description: High Security prison w. long term Cat B function 'working together to make a difference'. Urgent queries about a loved one should not be tweeted: ‚òéÔ∏è 01908722152

text: ... but are wanting to craft our recovery regime (as it is Covid safe to do so) learning from the positive surprises in this strange, frustrating, difficult but astonishing year. We want to keep the full 1 hour outdoors (we‚Äôve always only managed 30 mins previously) ...
user_description: High Security prison w. long term Cat B function 'working together to make a difference'. Urgent queries about a loved one should not be tweeted: ‚òéÔ∏è 01908722152

text: ... with smaller groups out rather than full wings of association. Complaints have dropped too.  Response to learning has been better for some who couldn‚Äôt handle classroom distractions. We don‚Äôt like seeing them still locked away the majority of each day ...
user_description: High Security prison w. long term Cat B function 'working together to make a difference'. Urgent queries about a loved one should not be tweeted: ‚òéÔ∏è 01908722152

text: .... throughout the lockdown such as a wider segment of men opting for PE (outdoor circuits) & a sense of it being fairer all round to be able to go.  Assaults on staff are down and responses to applications are now including time for staff to properly have the time to assist ...
user_description: High Security prison w. long term Cat B function 'working together to make a difference'. Urgent queries about a loved one should not be tweeted: ‚òéÔ∏è 01908722152

text: We‚Äôve also seen improvement all round in safety in Woodhill both in terms of self harm & violence dropping.  We have a violence survey going out to our men this weekend to see how much the improvements are linking to smaller ‚Äòbubbles‚Äô of 30. We‚Äôve seen some surprising results.... https://t.co/CZLli0Pwvy
